extracted_playbook.title: Update Siveillance Video Camera
extracted_playbook.description: Update Siveillance Video Camera to version V13.2 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms as a general security measure.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure IT Environment
extracted_playbook.description: Configure the IT environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security and follow recommendations in the product manuals.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Locate Networks Behind Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs), ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
